title: Some t206 HOFers for sale or trade (PB, Old Mill)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Some t206 HOFers for sale or trade (PB, Old Mill)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I have some t206s for sale.  I'd also be interested in trades for other t206 HOFers or Southern Leaguers that I need.  Prices include shipping.  Paypal gift or you pay the fees.  Pm me or email me any questions @ [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Huggins $35
Griffith port $47
Griffith batting $25
Evers sold
Chance sold
Davis sold
Willis $29

Thanks for looking
Bump to drop prices and add more cards
Last chance on the remaining 4 before I put them back in the trade bait box.  I'm going to the post office tomorrow, so let me know if you want any of these.
